content_to_avoid.Description: Material containing graphic sexual imagery or discussions inappropriate for children
Content that undermines the value of large families or promotes individualism over family commitments
Content that challenges or dismisses religious beliefs and practices
Media that prioritizes consumerism and material possessions over family relationships
Content that encourages children to ignore pain or discomfort by comparing it to religious suffering
